content:
{"name": "Toco Hills Community Alliance", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* We offer free groceries to those with low or no income in the North Central Dekalb county area.

* We are currently only serving hot lunches to those who are unhoused on a first come, first served basis.

* Food services are available from 1pm until 3:30pm on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday.

* All food services are drive-through if you come in a car. If you come in a car, you must remain in the car the entire time. If you take the bus or walk, you may walk up.

* The building is closed to the public. There are NO public restrooms. 

* Any planned closures (holidays) are put on our website and our Facebook page. We do close for inclement weather if Dekalb County Schools close. ", "email": "", "url": "https://tocohillsalliance.org/services", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1790 Lavista Road Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Merry Hills", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30329", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.8175723, "longitude": -84.328608}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 325-0677", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed before, during, and after holidays."}]}
